Description: Foot sherd (convex outer face) of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; glazed black on top and underside; reserved: resting surface and outer face of foot; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 506)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1496)
